0.text: Innate: Kayn has a secondary experience bar that tracks progress toward his  Darkin and  Shadow Assassin forms. He gathers orbs from champion  takedowns and each instance of damage (excluding damage over time) dealt against champions. Once he has earned enough orbs, he unlocks a form based on whether he earned more from  melee or  ranged champions (for  Darkin and  Shadow Assassin, respectively), with the other form unlocked later.
0.html: Innate: Kayn has a secondary experience bar that tracks progress toward his Darkin and Shadow Assassin forms. He gathers orbs from champion takedowns and each instance of damage (excluding damage over time) dealt against champions. Once he has earned enough orbs, he unlocks a form based on whether he earned more from melee or ranged champions (for Darkin and Shadow Assassin, respectively), with the other form unlocked later.
markedPassages: Darkin
Shadow Assassin
takedowns
melee
ranged
Darkin
Shadow Assassin

1.text: Kayn can move near the summoning platform to transform over 6 seconds, during which he is  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act. Kayn cannot choose a form if he is unable to cast abilities. The transformation will grant a passive bonus and permanently empower some of Kayn's abilities based on the form chosen. He gains a one-time Homeguard once the transformation is complete.
1.html: Kayn can move near the summoning platform to transform over 6 seconds, during which he is invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act. Kayn cannot choose a form if he is unable to cast abilities. The transformation will grant a passive bonus and permanently empower some of Kayn's abilities based on the form chosen. He gains a one-time Homeguard once the transformation is complete.
markedPassages: invulnerable
untargetable

2.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: If Kayn has been out of combat with enemy champions for over 8 seconds, or he casts  Umbral Trespass, he deals 15% − 45% (based on level) of post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy champions as bonus magic damage, lasting for 3 seconds upon entering combat and also applying on the first instance of damage dealt. If this effect is ready, it will not be lost by taking damage.
2.html: Shadow Assassin Bonus: If Kayn has been out of combat with enemy champions for over 8 seconds, or he casts Umbral Trespass, he deals 15% − 45% (based on level) of post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy champions as bonus magic damage, lasting for 3 seconds upon entering combat and also applying on the first instance of damage dealt. If this effect is ready, it will not be lost by taking damage.
markedPassages: Umbral Trespass

3.text: Darkin Bonus: Rhaast  heals for 20% − 30% (based on level) of the post-mitigation  physical damage that he deals to enemy champions with his abilities.
3.html: Darkin Bonus: Rhaast heals for 20% − 30% (based on level) of the post-mitigation physical damage that he deals to enemy champions with his abilities.
markedPassages: heals
physical damage

0.text: Active: Kayn  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through. He then swings his scythe, dealing the same damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Kayn dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through. He then swings his scythe, dealing the same damage to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: dashes

1.text: Both instances of Reaping Slash deal 40 bonus physical damage against  minions and  monsters.
1.html: Both instances of Reaping Slash deal 40 bonus physical damage against minions and monsters.
markedPassages: minions
monsters

2.text: Darkin Bonus: Reaping Slash's damage is modified to deal 65% AD (+ 5% (+ 3.5% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health) physical damage for both instances. This damage has a cap against monsters that does not include the bonus damage.
2.html: Darkin Bonus: Reaping Slash's damage is modified to deal 65% AD (+ 5% (+ 3.5% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health) physical damage for both instances. This damage has a cap against monsters that does not include the bonus damage.
markedPassages: (+ 5% (+ 3.5% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health)
(+ 5% (+ 3.5% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health)

3.text: Reaping Slash's dash speed scales with Kayn's  total movement speed.
3.html: Reaping Slash's dash speed scales with Kayn's  total movement speed.
markedPassages: total movement speed
possibleConcerningAbilities: Reaping Slash's dash speed scales with Kayn's  total movement speed.

0.text: Active: Kayn swings his scythe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Kayn swings his scythe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

1.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Blade's Reach's radius is extended by 200 units. Kayn conjures an  untargetable shadow at the casting position to perform Blade's Reach's sweep over 0.55 seconds in his stead, removing the ability's cast time.
1.html: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Blade's Reach's radius is extended by 200 units. Kayn conjures an untargetable shadow at the casting position to perform Blade's Reach's sweep over 0.55 seconds in his stead, removing the ability's cast time.
markedPassages: untargetable

2.text: Darkin Bonus: Blade's Reach  knocks up enemies hit for 1 second.
2.html: Darkin Bonus: Blade's Reach knocks up enemies hit for 1 second.
markedPassages: knocks up

0.text: Active: Kayn gains  40% bonus total movement speed,  ghosting and the ability to ignore terrain collision for a duration. If he has been in combat with enemy champions within the last 3 seconds, Shadow Step will instead last 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Kayn gains  40% bonus total movement speed, ghosting and the ability to ignore terrain collision for a duration. If he has been in combat with enemy champions within the last 3 seconds, Shadow Step will instead last 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: 40% bonus total movement speed
ghosting

1.text: Kayn  heals himself upon entering terrain for the first time from casting Shadow Step and he gains  unobstructed vision while inside.
1.html: Kayn heals himself upon entering terrain for the first time from casting Shadow Step and he gains unobstructed vision while inside.
markedPassages: heals
unobstructed vision

2.text: Receiving damage from or dealing damage to an enemy  champion while Shadow Step is active reduces its remaining duration to 1.5 seconds. This effect also cannot remain active out of terrain for longer than 1.5 seconds and will cancel immediately if Kayn performs a basic attack or becomes  immobilized, excluding from  sleep(bug), or  polymorphed.
2.html: Receiving damage from or dealing damage to an enemy champion while Shadow Step is active reduces its remaining duration to 1.5 seconds. This effect also cannot remain active out of terrain for longer than 1.5 seconds and will cancel immediately if Kayn performs a basic attack or becomes immobilized, excluding from sleep(bug), or polymorphed.
markedPassages: champion
immobilized
sleep
polymorphed

3.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Shadow Step's  cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds at all ranks. Kayn gains 100%  slow resist while active and, upon entering terrain, the bonus total movement speed is increased to 80% for the remaining duration.
3.html: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Shadow Step's  cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds at all ranks. Kayn gains 100% slow resist while active and, upon entering terrain, the bonus total movement speed is increased to 80% for the remaining duration.
markedPassages: cooldown
slow resist

0.text: Passive: Kayn marks enemy champions he damaged in the last 3.15 seconds.
0.html: Passive: Kayn marks enemy champions he damaged in the last 3.15 seconds.

1.text: Active: Kayn  vanishes and  dashes to a marked enemy champion. Upon arrival, he  channels for up to 2.5 seconds,  attaching to the target and  revealing them. Umbral Trespass can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically after the duration or if it is  interrupted.
1.html: Active: Kayn vanishes and dashes to a marked enemy champion. Upon arrival, he channels for up to 2.5 seconds, attaching to the target and revealing them. Umbral Trespass can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically after the duration or if it is interrupted.
markedPassages: vanishes
dashes
channels
attaching
revealing
interrupted

2.text: Recast: After a 0.75-second delay, Kayn deals physical damage to the target and  dashes out from their body in the target direction while still being  untargetable.
2.html: Recast: After a 0.75-second delay, Kayn deals physical damage to the target and dashes out from their body in the target direction while still being untargetable.
markedPassages: dashes
untargetable

3.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Umbral Trespass gains 200 bonus cast range and emerge range. Additionally, emerging will reset  The Darkin Scythe's  cooldown.
3.html: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Umbral Trespass gains 200 bonus cast range and emerge range. Additionally, emerging will reset The Darkin Scythe's  cooldown.
markedPassages: The Darkin Scythe's
cooldown

4.text: Darkin Bonus: Umbral Trespass is modified to deal physical damage equal to 15% (+ 13% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health, and  heals him for 9.75% (+ 8.45% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health.
4.html: Darkin Bonus: Umbral Trespass is modified to deal physical damage equal to 15% (+ 13% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health, and heals him for 9.75% (+ 8.45% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health.

textContent.text: Innate: Kayn has a secondary experience bar that tracks progress toward  Darkin and  Shadow Assassin forms. He gathers orbs from champion  takedowns and each instance of damage (excluding damage over time) against champions. Once he has earned enough orbs, he unlocks a form based on whether he earned more from  Melee or  Ranged champions (for  Darkin and  Shadow Assassin, respectively), with the other form unlocked later.
textContent.html: Innate: Kayn has a secondary experience bar that tracks progress toward Darkin and Shadow Assassin forms. Once he has earned enough orbs, he unlocks a form based on whether he earned more from Melee or Ranged champions (for Darkin and Shadow Assassin, respectively), with the other form unlocked later.

textContent.text: Kayn can return to the summoning platform to transform over 6 seconds, during which he is  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act. Kayn cannot choose a form if he is unable to cast abilities. The transformation will permanently empower some of Kayn's abilities, and he gains a one-time Homeguard.

textContent.html: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Umbral Trespass gains 200 bonus cast range and emerge range. Additionally, emerging will reset The Darkin Scythe's  cooldown.

textContent.text: Darkin Bonus: Umbral Trespass is modified to deal 15% (+ 13% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health physical damage, and  heals him for 9.75% (+ 8.45% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health.
textContent.html: Darkin Bonus: Umbral Trespass is modified to deal 15% (+ 13% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health physical damage, and heals him for 9.75% (+ 8.45% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health.
markedPassages: 15% (+ 13% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health
9.75% (+ 8.45% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health

textContent.text: Innate: Kayn has a secondary experience bar that tracks progress toward  Darkin and  Shadow Assassin forms. He gathers orbs from champion  takedowns and each instance of damage (excluding damage over time) against champions. Once he has earned enough orbs, he unlocks a form based on whether he earned more from  Melee or  Ranged champions (for  Darkin and  Shadow Assassin, respectively), with the other form unlocked later.
textContent.html: Innate: Kayn has a secondary experience bar that tracks progress toward Darkin and Shadow Assassin forms. He gathers orbs from champion takedowns and each instance of damage (excluding damage over time) against champions. Once he has earned enough orbs, he unlocks a form based on whether he earned more from Melee or Ranged champions (for Darkin and Shadow Assassin, respectively), with the other form unlocked later.

textContent.text: Kayn can return to the summoning platform to transform over 6 seconds, during which he is  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act. Kayn cannot choose a form if he is unable to cast abilities. The transformation will permanently empower some of Kayn's abilities, and he gains a one-time Homeguard.
textContent.html: Kayn can return to the summoning platform to transform over 6 seconds, during which he is invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act. Kayn cannot choose a form if he is unable to cast abilities. The transformation will permanently empower some of Kayn's abilities, and he gains a one-time Homeguard.

textContent.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: If Kayn has been out of combat with enemy champions for over 8 seconds, or he casts  Umbral Trespass, he deals 8% − 30% (based on level) of post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy champions as bonus magic damage, lasting for 3 seconds upon entering combat and also applying on the first instance of damage dealt. If this effect is ready, it will not go on cooldown by receiving damage.
textContent.html: Shadow Assassin Bonus: If Kayn has been out of combat with enemy champions for over 8 seconds, or he casts Umbral Trespass, he deals 8% − 30% (based on level) of post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy champions as bonus magic damage, lasting for 3 seconds upon entering combat and also applying on the first instance of damage dealt. If this effect is ready, it will not go on cooldown by receiving damage.

textContent.text: Darkin Bonus: Rhaast  heals for 20% − 30% (based on level) of the post-mitigation  physical damage that he deals to enemy champions with his abilities.
textContent.html: Darkin Bonus: Rhaast heals for 20% − 30% (based on level) of the post-mitigation physical damage that he deals to enemy champions with his abilities.

textContent.text: Active: Kayn  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through. He then swings his scythe, dealing the same damage to surrounding enemies.
textContent.html: Active: Kayn dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through. He then swings his scythe, dealing the same damage to surrounding enemies.

textContent.text: Both instances of Reaping Slash deal 40 bonus damage against  minions and  monsters.
textContent.html: Both instances of Reaping Slash deal 40 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

skillTabs.concerningText: Both instances of Reaping Slash deal 40 bonus damage against  minions and  monsters.
Both instances of Reaping Slash deal 40 bonus damage against  minions and  monsters.

textContent.text: Darkin Bonus: Reaping Slash's damage is modified to deal 65% AD (+ 5% (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health) physical damage for both instances. This damage has a cap against monsters that does not include the bonus damage.
textContent.html: Darkin Bonus: Reaping Slash's damage is modified to deal 65% AD (+ 5% (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health) physical damage for both instances. This damage has a cap against monsters that does not include the bonus damage.

skillTabs.concerningText: Darkin Bonus: Reaping Slash's damage is modified to deal 65% AD (+ 5% (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health) physical damage for both instances. This damage has a cap against monsters that does not include the bonus damage.

Darkin Bonus: Reaping Slash's damage is modified to deal 65% AD (+ 5% (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health) physical damage for both instances. This damage has a cap against monsters that does not include the bonus damage.

textContent.text: Reaping Slash's dash speed scales with Kayn's  total movement speed.
textContent.html: Reaping Slash's dash speed scales with Kayn's  total movement speed.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Reaping Slash's dash speed scales with Kayn's  total movement speed.

concerningSkills.skillName: reaping slash's dash speed scales with kayn's  total movement speed.

textContent.text: Active: Kayn swings his scythe in the target direction, dealing physical damage and  slowing enemies hit by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Active: Kayn swings his scythe in the target direction, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies hit by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Kayn swings his scythe in the target direction, dealing physical damage and  slowing enemies hit by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.

textContent.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Blade's Reach's area is extended by 200 units. Kayn conjures an  untargetable living shadow at the casting position to perform Blade's Reach's sweep over 0.55 seconds in his stead, removing the ability's cast time.
textContent.html: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Blade's Reach's area is extended by 200 units. Kayn conjures an untargetable living shadow at the casting position to perform Blade's Reach's sweep over 0.55 seconds in his stead, removing the ability's cast time.

textContent.text: Darkin Bonus: Blade's Reach knocks up enemies hit for 1 second.
textContent.html: Darkin Bonus: Blade's Reach knocks up enemies hit for 1 second.

textContent.text: Active: Kayn gains  40% bonus total movement speed,  ghosting and the ability to ignore terrain collision for a duration. If he has been in combat with enemy champions within the last 3 seconds, Shadow Step will instead last 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Active: Kayn gains  40% bonus total movement speed, ghosting and the ability to ignore terrain collision for a duration. If he has been in combat with enemy champions within the last 3 seconds, Shadow Step will instead last 1.5 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Kayn gains  40% bonus total movement speed,  ghosting and the ability to ignore terrain collision for a duration. If he has been in combat with enemy champions within the last 3 seconds, Shadow Step will instead last 1.5 seconds.

textContent.text: Kayn  heals himself upon entering terrain for the first time from casting Shadow Step and he gains  unobstructed vision while inside.
textContent.html: Kayn heals himself upon entering terrain for the first time from casting Shadow Step and he gains unobstructed vision while inside.

skillTabs.concerningText: Kayn  heals himself upon entering terrain for the first time from casting Shadow Step and he gains  unobstructed vision while inside.

textContent.text: Receiving damage from or dealing damage to an enemy  champion while Shadow Step is active reduces its remaining duration to 1.5 seconds. This effect also cannot remain active out of terrain for longer than 1.5 seconds and will cancel immediately if Kayn performs a basic attack or becomes  immobilized, excluding from  sleep(bug), or  polymorphed.
textContent.html: Receiving damage from or dealing damage to an enemy champion while Shadow Step is active reduces its remaining duration to 1.5 seconds. This effect also cannot remain active out of terrain for longer than 1.5 seconds and will cancel immediately if Kayn performs a basic attack or becomes immobilized, excluding from sleep(bug), or polymorphed.

textContent.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Shadow Step's  cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds at all ranks. Kayn gains 100%  slow resist and, upon entering terrain, the bonus total movement speed is increased to 80% for the remaining duration.
textContent.html: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Shadow Step's  cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds at all ranks. Kayn gains 100% slow resist and, upon entering terrain, the bonus total movement speed is increased to 80% for the remaining duration.

textContent.text: Passive: Kayn marks enemy champions he damaged in the last 3.15 seconds.
textContent.html: Passive: Kayn marks enemy champions he damaged in the last 3.15 seconds.

textContent.text: Active: Kayn  vanishes and  dashes to a marked enemy champion. Upon arrival, he  channels for up to 2.5 seconds,  attaching to the target and  revealing them. Umbral Trespass can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically after the duration or is  interrupted.
textContent.html: Active: Kayn vanishes and dashes to a marked enemy champion. Upon arrival, he channels for up to 2.5 seconds, attaching to the target and revealing them. Umbral Trespass can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically after the duration or is interrupted.

textContent.text: Recast: After a 0.75-second delay, Kayn deals physical damage to the target and  dashes out from their body in the target direction while still being  untargetable.
